I love this game but it is criminally unfun to play as of right now. Killer is incredibly underpowered unless you play one of the top 3 Killers with all the best perks and addons. Survivor fluctuates between incredibly easy to the point of boredom or a disastrous mess if your team doesn't play efficiently. The game is lopsidedly balanced in the Survivors favor, yet they feel compelled to teabag and verbally harass you for killing them. The game itself is amazing, and the cast of characters are all interesting and unique. Just don't play it for more than 100 hrs. It's all downhill from there.
Makes me want to kill myself.
Game is a ton of fun but when you can get your friends in on the game makes it even better.
I now play this game once per month and I've never had a better time! 10/10

Esse jogo é lindo! os 40 contos mais bem gastos que eu já tive quase 138 horas de gameplay minha e não paro de jogar. Aconselho demais comprar. Absurdamente divertido jogar de killer, e ainda mais divertido jogar de survivor com amigos.

bugs , troll teams , mad hit boxes , mechanics which are unfair and unavoidable, team mates unhooking while the killer stands and waits with a hatchet, teammates dropping pallets on you , half the killers are afk , the others either let you win or are sweat lords who never play survivor, que for killer is 20 minuets , survivor is 5 , go figure.

playing killer is great fun , you lose 1 in 10 games even as a new player since killers are consistent and survivors are anything but, sweaty killers everywhere.

Buen juego, divertido, sobretodo con amigos, el tema de añadir DLC y nuevos asesinos/ sobrevivientes le da extensión de vida al mismo. 
Aunque el match no es de los mejores del mundo, intenté jugar como asesino y estuve más de 30 minutos esperando y no me emparejó nunca. Tiene leves problemas de conectividad. 
En cuanto a gráficos están bastante bien logrados, juego recomendado. Sobretodo si te gusta gastar en skins. 

Cuando eres killer los otros te trollean XD

En lo personal, personajes como Pennywise o de The Walking Dead quedarían como anillo al dedo.

They recently ruined the game by replacing the matchmaking system. Now as a survivor the killer is either super bad and super toxic, or incredibly op. There is maybe 1/5 games that could be considered "fun". Don't buy this game until it's fixed.

It is easier now to rank up, but ranks don't mean anything anymore except they show how much time you've played the game this month. When you perform well in a match, you don't even now if it's worth anything since you don't know how good of a player the killer or the team mates were... the matchmaking is a lot faster now, but it seems completely random, ridiculous really. You barely get any afk killers anymore, I guess that's a plus? But they are still not doing anything against the horde of killers who are campers. 

The developers lost control.

Edit: Everything has gotten even worse now. Because of free-to-play, now all you get are facecampers, tunnelers and straight up boons.
Fun to play with friends. Otherwise just no.

Yikes guys, I took a break from this game due to the lack of time I had to play games like this but I have played a lot before. This new system you guys have for matchmaking is horrid. just getting back into the game and I cant play killer matches without getting stomped into oblivion every time. This used to be such a fun game. it should be a little heavily tipped to the killer side due to the killer not having any teammates. That's usually how these 1v4 multiplayer games work, but now? its not even fun to play killer because by the time i get my first hook the team of people who have been constantly playing for the past 6 months, are finishing the last gen or has the door open by then. I know I wont be playing Dead by Daylight anytime soon until you guys fix your matchmaking. Its a shame, even 6 months ago, this game was so much fun to play.

Aside from the numerous, frequent, and constant bugs, there seems to be more penalty for victims of griefing than there is for the people committing the griefing. A game that had a lot of potential to be fun for a long time, just stops being fun because there is absolutely NO consequence for in game harrassment.  Imagine paying for this game and the many DLCs it has, just to be forced to finish matches where you can't even get a chance to play it because an opposing player is allowed to hover you until you die....Screw this game and the devolopers that allow the griefing to continue. Dying Light 2 is out now!!!

Quería llegar a las mil horas antes de hacer una reseña pero el juego poco a poco va alejando a los jugadores así que escribire esto antes de que me aburra y olvide hacer la reseña. Dead by Daylight, en pocas palabras es un buen juego de estrategia, persecuciones y entretenimiento. Aunque se auto catalogue "Terror" de terror no tiene nada, te puede sacar uno que otro susto pero poco mas. El juego tiene buenas bases y un sistema que funciona, por lo menos las primeras 500 horas de juego. El juego no es del todo repetitivo y mucho menos si decides jugar de asesino, pero si es cierto que la falta de otros modo de juego y encima con el nuevo sistema de MMR que colocaron cada vez se sigue sintiendo como el juego deja de ser divertido (Y mas si juegas solo) claro todo depende de como te lo tomes tu y si decides ignorar los comentarios de los jugadores toxicos y los bugs del juego. 

En lo personal, lo recomiendo. Cuando publique esta reseña aun estoy a la espera de VHS y próximos juegos del mismo genero pero aunque sean buenos juegos tengo el presentimiento de que DBD seguirá siendo el único en su tipo así que no vendría nada mal tenerlo por si encuentras un grupo de amigos con quien jugarlo y echarse unas risas.
